title: Ramps for Basement Parking-Ramps for parking in basements shall conform to the requirements of sub-regulations (16) of Regulation 37
clause_text: Ramps for Basement Parking-Ramps for parking in basements shall conform to the requirements of sub-regulations (16) of Regulation 37.
